summary: When you have the chance to write a sequel, you do it… right.  Well, for Alan Smale, the answer was not as straightforward as all that.  Come find out why he hesitated at first to write Radiant Sky, and why now he’s glad he did...

summary: The past few weeks AppStories has had a different MacStories host as a guest and this week was my turn.  In the AppStories+ pre-show we talk about the origins of Ruminate and in the main show we discuss the fediverse and ActivityPub, some of my projects, as well as my development setup.  Stick around to find out what kind of person Federico thinks I am because I'm still reeling...
title: I Was a Guest On AppStories This Week
